error_message_generic_error.message: Sorry, we couldn't translate your text. Please try again later.

error_message_internet_connection.message: Sorry, there’s an issue with the internet connection. Please try again.

error_message_please_login.message: Please log in again to translate this text.

error_message_quota_has_been_reached.description: There is an API error when the user reaches his quota and therefore is not longer able to use the pro endpoint and if does not get logged out he can not longer use the extension. We need to show him a message so the user knows why he logged out
error_message_quota_has_been_reached.message: You've reached your account usage limit.

error_message_session_expired.message: Sorry, your session expired. Please log in again.

error_message_technical_issue.message: Sorry, we couldn’t translate your text due to a known technical issue. We are working to fix this issue in the near future.

error_message_too_many_requests.description: Info for free users that too many requests are triggered
error_message_too_many_requests.message: Sorry, we couldn't translate your text. It appears that your network is sending too many requests to our servers.

extension_settings_keyboard_shortcut_per.description: This text will be displayed in the settings screen of the browser (we can only set the label here).

firefox_add_on_store_body_content.message:
With the DeepL for Firefox extension, you can enjoy DeepL’s unbeatable translation quality without ever leaving your browser.

You’ll be able to effortlessly and instantly translate as you’re reading or writing within Firefox. If you’re a DeepL Pro user, that includes entire web pages. 
If you’re a free user, we’re working on releasing this feature for you too. Until then, you can simply select any text and the DeepL icon will appear. To translate your selection, click on the icon. If you want to translate even faster, set up your own shortcuts in the settings, for both reading or writing with DeepL on Firefox.

Now you no longer have to worry about missing out on any information throughout the web due to a language barrier. 

Download DeepL for Firefox for free to start translating today.

Translate while reading
You won’t have to skip emails, articles, or websites anymore. You can view the content you’re browsing in Firefox in your chosen language, in its original context. 

Translate your writing
Whether you’re writing a social media post, chat message, or email, you can translate your own words immediately after you type them. This means you no longer have to copy, paste, retype, or leave Firefox to communicate in another language.

Full-page translations
If you’re a DeepL Pro user, you can translate entire web pages into your desired language with just one click. To make things even easier, you can choose to have all websites in specific languages automatically translated for a seamless browsing experience. We’re working on releasing this feature for free users too. 

DeepL Pro login 
DeepL Pro users can log in to their accounts through the extension.

Shortcuts
Use simple shortcuts to make translation quicker and easier. You can set your own shortcuts in the settings.

Unparalleled accuracy
You can rest assured that you’re getting the best possible translations on the website or application you’re using. DeepL translations consistently outperform the competition and are proven to be three times more accurate than translations from major tech companies.

Loved by millions of users
Millions of people around the world use DeepL every day to improve their communication.

Choose from more than 30 languages
For a list of the languages available in the extension, check out this article in our Help Center: https://support.deepl.com/hc/en-us/articles/4407573562386-Languages-in-the-browser-extension

firefox_add_on_store_description.message: Translate while you read and write with DeepL Translate, the world’s most accurate translator.

firefox_add_on_store_title.description:
There is a character limit of 50 on the Firefox store, so many of the existing titles from Chrome will not work in other languages. 

Note: after trying to upload these to the store, it turns out the title cannot use "Firefox" or "Mozilla"

firefox_beta_share_feedback_link.description: A part of the main extension popup window that asks users to give their feedback about the extension for Firefox
firefox_beta_share_feedback_link.message: Help us finish the DeepL extension for Firefox by <feedbackLink>sharing your feedback with us</feedbackLink>

firefox_browser_permissions_popup_body.message: Allow your Firefox browser to give DeepL access to the websites you visit.

firefox_legal_disclaimer_body_main.description: To use DeepL for Firefox, we need your permission to access and process the texts that you request to be translated or improved while browsing. Only if you turn on the full-page translation feature do you allow us to process the content of whole web pages.    When you log in to DeepL for Firefox with your account, we will process your personal data needed to provide the features accessible under your plan.    We also collect technical, device, and usage data to make sure that the DeepL Firefox extension runs properly on your browser and to detect and prevent fraudulent behavior.    You can read more about our policies here:
firefox_legal_disclaimer_body_main.message:
To use DeepL for Firefox, we need your permission to access and process the texts that you request to be translated or improved while browsing. Only if you turn on the full-page translation feature do you allow us to process the content of whole web pages.

When you log in to DeepL for Firefox with your account, we will process your personal data needed to provide the features accessible under your plan.

We also collect technical, device, and usage data to make sure that the DeepL Firefox extension runs properly on your browser and to detect and prevent fraudulent behavior.

You can read more about our policies here:

firefox_legal_disclaimer_link_two.description: <termsLink>Terms of service</termsLink> for users without a DeepL (Pro) account
firefox_legal_disclaimer_link_two.message: <termsLink>Terms of service</termsLink> for users without a DeepL (Pro) account

ui_notification_fpt_hide.message: You have chosen not to show the full-page translation pop-up. You can change this in the settings

ui_share_error.message: There was an error while copying the text

ui_share_feedback.description: The link to our feedback survey.

ui_share_success.description:
A button to share the link of the Chrome extension to my friends

If I click on that button:
- The link to the Chrome Store is copied into the clipboard
- A message is sent to the user confirming this and letting them know that they can share that link with their friends.

ui_target_language_select.message: Which language do you want to translate into?

ui_toaster_feedback_form_line_2.message: Could you help us improve by taking a 1-minute survey?

ui_toaster_gmail_feedback_button.description: The action button for the gmail customization survey

ui_toaster_gmail_feedback_content.description: The content of a feedback popup for gmail users
ui_toaster_gmail_feedback_content.message: Take 2 minutes to tell us how we can improve.

ui_toaster_gmail_feedback_title.description: The title of a popup box where we ask for a user's opinion on the Gmail customization
ui_toaster_gmail_feedback_title.message: What do you think of DeepL?

ui_toaster_how_was_your_experience_line_.message: We’d like your feedback on the DeepL for Chrome extension.
We’d like your feedback on the DeepL for Edge extension

ui_toaster_how_was_your_experience_line_.description:
See bottom right of the screenshot. A message pops up when the user has done a few translations, asking them to give feedback on the Firefox extension

Note: The rest of the pop-up has already been translated for Chrome (e.g. "How has your experience been?")
ui_toaster_how_was_your_experience_line_.message: We’d like your feedback on the DeepL for Firefox extension.

ui_toaster_how_was_your_experience_line_.description:
The second line of the first screen of the popup window that appears after the user has used the extension for a bit, asking for their feedback. 

The source copy is identical to the original Chrome key, but this will only be used on Firefox

ui_toaster_write_a_review_line_1.message: Thank you. That's nice to hear!

ui_toaster_write_a_review_line_2.message: Would you like to share your feedback in the Chrome Web Store?

ui_toaster_write_a_review_line_2_edge.message: Would you like to share your feedback in the Edge Extension Store?

ui_toaster_write_a_review_line_2_firefox.description:
Part of the flow in the pop up (see screenshot) when a user says their experience has been positive. 

Note: The rest of the pop-up is already translated for Chrome
ui_toaster_write_a_review_line_2_firefox.message: Would you like to leave us a review?

ui_try_button.description: The button leads to the document translator:  https://www.deepl.com/translator/files

ui_zendesk_input_language_mismatch.message: The language doesn't match the recipient's. Submit anyway?

ui_zendesk_modal_language_not_supported_.message: DeepL can't translate from your language yet
We'll notify you as soon as it becomes available

ui_zendesk_onboarding_free_trial_notice.message: This extension is free for a limited time. Give it a try and share your feedback

ui_zendesk_onboarding_title.message:
Manage your tickets
in multiple languages

ui_zendesk_onboarding_usp_1.message: Translate messages or entire threads on the fly

warning_message_account_limit_reached.message: You've reached your account usage limit. Please contact <deeplSupportLink>DeepL Support</deeplSupportLink> to increase your limit.

warning_message_different_subscription_n.message: Sorry, your plan doesn’t include access to that feature.

warning_message_free_usage_limit_reached.message: You’ve reached your free usage limit. Want to keep translating?

write_language_not_supported.description: We will show this message anywhere we have DeepL write functionality and we detect that the user is writing in a language we don't support.
write_language_not_supported.message: DeepL Write doesn’t support this language yet.

write_not_supported_language_message.message: Looks like DeepL Write doesn't support this language yet

write_style_options_description_style.message: We’ll tailor your text to your audience and goals

write_style_options_description_tone.message: We’ll add the selected tone to your text

writing_config_tab_switch_label.message: Show the DeepL icon for writing

zendesk_glossary_remove_label.description: A link that allows users to disable the currently active glossary

zendesk_glossary_toggle_label.description: This is just the word "Glossary" at the top of the feature. Users can click it to show or hide additional information about glossaries in the same dropdown.

zendesk_limit_reached_content.message: To continue translating, sign up for DeepL Pro Advanced—free for 30 days.

zendesk_limit_reached_infobox.message: You’ve reached the free translation limit.

zendesk_no_glossaries_found.message: We couldn’t find any glossaries available for your account.

zendesk_not_pro_user_body.message: Glossaries are only available for DeepL Pro users.

zendesk_onboarding_content_one.message: Translate tickets on the fly—up to $translationLimit$ translations for free

zendesk_plugin_extension_installed_conte.message: Translate your work in an instant, as you read and write tickets.

zendesk_plugin_extension_not_installed_c.message: We've replaced the plug-in with a fully integrated extension.

zendesk_popup_char_limit_content.message: For unlimited translations, try DeepL Pro Advanced—it’s free for 30 days.

zendesk_try_pro_log_in_link.message: Already have Pro Advanced or Ultimate? Log in to your account
